decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and Access Statement, JDD/HSHM-04, received on 18/10/2013 and JDD/HSHM-01, 02, 03, 05, received on 10/12/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted for A2 (Financial and Professional Services) purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times, 9:00am to 10:00pm Monday to Saturday, and 9:00am to 6:00pm on Sundays and Public Holidays.

Condition : 4 - The access doorway to the premiese shall have a minimum clear width of 900mm, a level surface or ramp between the pavement and the floor and a door handle of not more than 1m above ground level.

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the terms of the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification) the premises shall not be used as a betting shop.
Condition : 6 - The premises shall maintain a shop window display in the front and side elevations
description: Change of use from class A1 shop to A2 financial and professional services
